eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Pennsylvania; at 06:24 AM ON DEC 16, 2025 Effective until 08:24 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Test This is a State Wide Required Weekly Test of the Emergency Alert System originating from the Pennsylvania Emergency Management Agency, Harrisburg. This is only a test
